body:
Show off your keyboard (or keyboards) in this thread.

The three boards that I use: Ducky Shine 4 YOTH w/ MX Browns, Poker 2 w/ MX Clears, and Corsair K&) RGB w/ MX Reds.

Also two boards that I'm currently working on fixing: Corsair K50 Raptor w/ a broken spacebar stabilizer and a Ducky Zero w/ a few sticky MX Blue switches.

Look here for a picture of my two main boards.

title: Post your keyboard(s)

replies.body: lol, Microsoft Wireless 800, My keyboard sucks...got a good mouse though (Logitech g402)
replies.body_tagged: lol, Microsoft Wireless 800, My keyboard sucks...got a good mouse though (Logitech g402)

replies.body: It's not about the board you have, it's if you like what you are typing on. As my favorite subreddit says "By keyboards we mean ALL keyboards: Mechanical, Scissor Switch, Capacitive/TouchScreen, and yes..even rubber domes. Because there IS no perfect switch, only the switch that is perfect for YOU!"
